venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Spiritual Awakening and Psychic Development Teachings
This three level course will challenge you!  It will give you the valuable tools and support you need to create an amazing and purposeful life.  Awareness of why you are here and how to get to where you really want to be are key aspects to this class as well as the main focus of developing psychically.  Combining science and spirituality, pragmatic and alternative knowledge, this class is a three tiered and proven approach to strong psychic awareness.  It will empower you to take off the blinders to your current life, make decisions based on your inner knowledge, and hone your natural psychic abilities.  The result... living in abundance and blissful spiritual flow.  If you find yourself presented with difficulties, are wishing to open up intuitively and psychically or if you are simply ready to make a change in your life, this class will provide you with what you need to do just that!
Click Here to Read Testimonials From Previous Students
I love teaching this class.  It’s an honor and it’s amazing to see the outstanding growth each student experiences!
                                                                 - Isabeau Esby

LEVEL ONE
6 Hour Course - 4 Tuesdays - May 17th and May 24rd, May 31st, and June 7th - from 7:00 PM to 8:30 PM - Total Cost $100
Topics include - Energy Awareness, Spiritual Protection, Negativity, Ethics, Life Balancing, and Seeing True Reality
Limited Space Available & This Class Fills Quickly - Register by Calling 603-973-2317 or Emailing isabeauesby@me.com

For more information visit www.IsabeauEsby.com
item.how_to_find_us: From the I-95, take exit 3 (95 northbound) or exit 3B (southbound) to Route 33 W. The Center will be 2.6 miles on the right, at the corner of 33 and Bayside, in the Gowen's Corner Plaza. The entrance is just to the left of Bayside Custon Frame & Mi
item.why: This class is geared toward learning how to live an intuitive life.
item.name: Spiritual Awakening and Psychic Development Class - Level One
